# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
T3033-2424N1 | Acquisition of Snow Pusher for Schefferville, Quebec

## Reference
WS4403725726-Doc4403739568 Amendment 2

## Publication Details
* Published on: February 7, 2024
* Tender closing date: February 29, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST
* Expected contract start date: March 1, 2024
* Expected contract end date: August 15, 2024

## Description
Transport Canada, on behalf of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), invites bidders to submit proposals for the acquisition of a snow pusher, including delivery at Schefferville, Quebec. The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Procurement Details
* Procurement method: Competitive, open bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest price
* Regions of opportunity: None
* Regions of delivery: Schefferville, Quebec

## Contract Details
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
* Contact person: Francois S. Martineau, francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Assessment and Evaluation
Prequalification and/or evaluation results will be announced in the coming weeks. 

## Tender Documents
Please refer to the original tender documents available on the government procurement website:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18736213?extsite=MTg3MzYyMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Important Dates
Tender closing date: February 29, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST
